title: My Cheating Wife
description: When Sam comes home for lunch one day unannounced, he’s the one who gets the surprise. First, there is a strange truck in the driveway. Then, his wife, Beth, is nowhere to be found. But when he follows noises up the stairs and to their bedroom, there is no mistaking what his ‘uptight’ wife is up to. After listening in on his wife and her lover go at it, Sam is surprised by how turned on he is by the whole thing. And now he is determined to devise a clever way to watch his wife being taken by this other man, without her knowledge. What he doesn’t realise is that once he does, there will be no turning back.
